alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Harnett (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 7:20PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Harnett and northwestern Cumberland Counties through 800 PM EDT... At 720 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Pope AFB, or near Fort Liberty, moving northwest at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Fayetteville, Fort Liberty, Pope AFB, Spring Lake, Timberlake and Anderson Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
